title: New York Prepares For Slain Officer's Funeral
teaser: NYPD officer Wenjian Liu will be laid to rest Sunday. Liu and his partner were killed last month. Cops from around the U.S. will attend, and questions remain about how they'll greet Mayor de Blasio.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
